text: A deer with a missing eye was quiet on the shores of the sea, turning its eye untouched toward the land to observe the possible arrival of hunters, and giving to the sea the side that lacked the eye, for from there he expected no danger. But it turns out that people were sailing around this place, and seeing the deer they shot her down with their darts. The woman, dying, said to herself, 'I am sorry! I watched over the land, which I thought was full of dangers, and the sea, which I considered a refuge, has been much more damaging to me. Try to see the pros and cons of everything.
title: La cierva tuerta
author: nan Esopo
